text_en: The world is confusing for the deafblind. They don’t know where the things come from. Things appear and disappear.
The kitchen garden gives the students an opportunity to know where the vegetables they eat during the day come from.
text_fr: This section describes Lousie´s way of communication, her learning style and her preferred activities. It also gives her communication partner information about ways of communication.

text_en: Where do the bananas come from, where do the maize come from?
text_fr: Each child is assessed and have their own plan.

text_en: They get involved in the process of doing the seedbed, the planting, the watering.
text_fr: This girl need to be close her partner when communicating.

text_en: We want them to be whole when they leave Kilimani.
When work is done we go for a high five.
